verses.verse: Let <WG3049> a man<WG444> so<WG3779> account<WG3049> of us<WG2248>, as<WG5613> of ministers<WG5257> of Christ<WG5547>, and<WG2532> stewards<WG3623> of the mysteries<WG3466> of God<WG2316>.
Here <WG3063>, moreover, <WG3739> it is required<WG2212> in<WG1722> stewards<WG3623>, that<WG2443> a man<WG5100> be found<WG2147> faithful<WG4103>.

But <WG1161> with me<WG1698> it<WG1519> is<WG2076> a very small thing<WG1646> that<WG2443> I should be judged<WG350> of<WG5259> you<WG5216>, or<WG2228> of<WG5259> man<WG442>'s judgment<WG2250>: yea<WG235>, I judge<WG350> not<WG3761> mine own self<WG1683>.

For <WG1063> I know<WG4894> nothing<WG3762> against myself<WG1683>; yet<WG235> am I<WG1344> not<WG3756> hereby5129, 1722 justified<WG1344>: but<WG1161> he<WG3588> that judgeth<WG350> me<WG3165> is<WG2076> the Lord<WG2962>.

Wherefore <WG5620> judge2919, Acts0 nothing<WG3361> before4253, Leviticus2 the time<WG2540>, until<WG2193> the Lord<WG2962> come<WG2064>, who<WG3739> will both<WG2532> bring to light<WG5461> the hidden things<WG2927> of darkness<WG4655>, and<WG2532> make manifest<WG5319> the counsels<WG1012> of the hearts<WG2588>; and<WG2532> then<WG5119> shall<WG1096> each man<WG1538> have<WG1096> his praise<WG1868> from<WG575> God<WG2316>.

Now <WG1161> these things<WG5023>, brethren<WG80>, I have in a figure transferred<WG3345> to<WG1519> myself<WG1683> and<WG2532> Apollos<WG625> for<WG1223> your sakes<WG5209>; that<WG2443> in<WG1722> us<WG2254> ye might learn<WG3129> not<WG3361> to go<WG5426> beyond<WG5228> the things which<WG3739> are written<WG1125>; that<WG2443> no<WG3361> one<WG1520> of you be puffed up<WG5448> for<WG5228> the one<WG1520> against<WG2596> the other<WG2087>.

For <WG1063> who<WG5101> maketh<WG1252> thee<WG4571> to differ<WG1252>? and<WG1161> what<WG5101> hast thou<WG2192> that<WG3739> thou<WG2192> didst<WG2983> not<WG3756> receive<WG2983>? but if1487, 2532 thou didst receive<WG2983> it<WG5101>, why dost thou glory<WG2744> as if<WG5613> thou hadst<WG2983> not<WG3361> received it<WG2983>?

Already <WG2235> are<WG2075> ye filled<WG2880>, already<WG2235> ye are become rich<WG4147>, ye have come to reign<WG936> without<WG5565> us<WG2257>: yea and<WG2532> I would<WG3785> that<WG1065> ye did reign<WG936>, that<WG2443> we<WG2249> also<WG2532> might reign<WG4821> with you<WG5213>.

For <WG1063>, I think<WG1380>, <WG3754> God<WG2316> hath set forth<WG584> us<WG2248> the apostles<WG652> last<WG2078> of all<WG5613>, as men doomed to death<WG1935>: for<WG3754> we are made<WG1096> a spectacle<WG2302> unto the world<WG2889>, both<WG2532> to angels<WG32> and<WG2532> men<WG444>.

We <WG2249> are fools<WG3474> for<WG1223> Christ<WG5547>'s sake, but<WG1161> ye<WG5210> are wise<WG5429> in<WG1722> Christ<WG5547>; we<WG2249> are weak<WG772>, but<WG1161> ye<WG5210> are strong<WG2478>; ye<WG5210> have glory<WG1741>, but<WG1161> we<WG2249> have dishonor<WG820>.

Even unto<WG891> this present<WG737> hour<WG5610> we<WG3983> both<WG2532> hunger<WG3983>, and<WG2532> thirst<WG1372>, and<WG2532> are naked<WG1130>, and<WG2532> are buffeted<WG2852>, and<WG2532> have no certain dwelling-place<WG790>;
and <WG2532> we toil<WG2872>, working<WG2038> with our own<WG2398> hands<WG5495>: being reviled<WG3058>, we bless<WG2127>; being persecuted<WG1377>, we endure<WG430>;
being defamed<WG987>, we entreat<WG3870>: we are made<WG1096> as<WG5613> the filth<WG4027> of the world<WG2889>, the offscouring<WG4067> of all things<WG3956>, even until<WG2193> now<WG737>.
I write<WG1125> not<WG3756> these things<WG5023> to shame<WG1788> you<WG5209>, but<WG235> to admonish<WG3560> you as<WG5613> my<WG3450> beloved<WG27> children<WG5043>.

For <WG1063> though<WG1437> ye have<WG2192> ten thousand<WG3463> tutors<WG3807> in<WG1722> Christ<WG5547>, yet<WG235> have ye not<WG3756> many<WG4183> fathers<WG3962>; for<WG1063> in<WG1722> Christ<WG5547> Jesus<WG2424> I<WG1473> begat<WG1080> you<WG5209> through<WG1223> the gospel<WG2098>.
I beseech<WG3870> you<WG5209> therefore<WG3767>, be ye<WG1096> imitators<WG3402> of me<WG3450>.

For <WG1223> this cause<WG5124> have I sent<WG3992> unto you<WG5213> Timothy<WG5095>, who<WG3739> is<WG2076> my<WG3450> beloved<WG27> and<WG2532> faithful<WG4103> child<WG5043> in<WG1722> the Lord<WG2962>, who<WG3739> shall put<WG363> you<WG5209> in remembrance<WG363> of my<WG3450> ways<WG3598> which are<WG3588> in<WG1722> Christ<WG5547>, even as<WG2531> I teach<WG1321> everywhere<WG3837> in<WG1722> every<WG3956> church<WG1577>.
Now <WG1161> some<WG5100> are puffed up<WG5448>, as though<WG5613> I<WG3450> were<WG2064> not<WG3361> coming<WG2064> to<WG4314> you<WG5209>.

But <WG1161> I will come<WG2064> to<WG4314> you<WG5209> shortly<WG5030>, if<WG1437> the Lord<WG2962> will<WG2309>; and<WG2532> I will know<WG1097>, not<WG3756> the word<WG3056> of them that<WG3588> are puffed up<WG5448>, but<WG235> the power<WG1411>.
For <WG1063> the kingdom<WG932> of God<WG2316> is not<WG3756> in<WG1722> word<WG3056>, but<WG235> in<WG1722> power<WG1411>.
What <WG5101> will ye<WG2309>? shall I come<WG2064> unto<WG4314> you<WG5209> with<WG1722> a rod<WG4464>, or<WG2228> in<WG1722> love<WG26> and<WG5037> a spirit<WG4151> of gentleness<WG4236>?
